publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1367.2 Jeremy Purvis: Graduate Endowment Abolition (Scotland) Billâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1367) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and, in so doing, calls on the Scottish Ministers, when taking forward their consultation on student support later this year, to consider a number of wider options to improve financial support for students, including specific reference to the development of a new minimum income guarantee." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
